page.title: 13The Shops In Highworth.
page.content: We asked 50 people 6 questions,these are the results.33 people shop in Highworth and 45 people shop in Swindon.The most popular shops in Highworth are the supermarkets, chemists,butchers,post office,drapery and grocers.The general person shops in Highworth every day but some will shop less or go to Carrefours (a large hypermarket) instead; people shop in Swindon usually once a week.In Highworth we have 1 off licence,3 paper shops,2 green grocers, 1 market (which comes on a Saturday) 4 estate agents,1 veternary surgery, 2 bakeries, 2 video shops, 2 hair_ dressers, 2 clothes shops, 2 butchers, 3 banks, 1 furniture shop,several pubs, 2 chemists and 1 post office.
